en.name: English
en.welcome_message: Hello! I'm your AI medical assistant. I can help identify common illnesses based on your symptoms and suggest over-the-counter medicines. Please describe your symptoms to get started.
en.no_symptoms_detected: I didn't detect any specific symptoms in your message. Could you please describe your symptoms more clearly? For example: 'I have a headache and fever' or 'I'm experiencing stomach pain and nausea'.
en.symptoms_noted: I've noted your symptoms: {symptoms}. Do you have any additional symptoms? The more information you provide, the better I can help you.
en.more_symptoms: I understand you have: {symptoms}. Could you tell me about any other symptoms you're experiencing?
en.diagnosis_result:
Based on your symptoms ({symptoms}), you may have **{disease}**.

**Suggested over-the-counter medicines:**
{medicines}

*Do you have any other symptoms you'd like to mention?*
en.daily_limit_reached: Daily chat limit reached ({limit} chats). Please upgrade your plan or try again tomorrow.
en.plan_switched: Plan switched to {plan}! You can now enjoy the new features.
